subsection.title: Purpose
subsection.description: Briefly describe the overall purpose and overview of the document.

subsection.title: Document Name
subsection.description: Provide the official name of the document.

subsection.title: Target Users
subsection.description: Define the primary target users or personas for this product.
subsection.example: - Small business owners who need to manage inventory - Marketing teams in mid-sized companies

subsection.title: Core Problem
subsection.description: Describe the core problem that this product aims to solve.
subsection.example: - Users spend too much time manually tracking inventory across multiple spreadsheets.

subsection.title: Solution Strategy
subsection.description: Explain the high-level approach to solving the core problem.
subsection.example: - Provide a centralized dashboard that automatically syncs inventory data from multiple sources.

subsection.title: Success Criteria
subsection.description: Define the criteria that will determine whether the product is successful.
subsection.example: - 80% of users can complete inventory updates in under 5 minutes. - User satisfaction score of 4.0 or higher.

subsection.title: Key Differentiators
subsection.description: List the unique features or advantages that set this product apart from competitors.
subsection.example: - AI-powered demand forecasting - One-click integration with major e-commerce platforms
